snippet.title: Rolling in the Sheepe: Official Trailer (Windows, Mac, Linux)
snippet.description:
1-6 sheep compete to roll over the finish line first. Rollable shape not required. 

A family friendly, silly, chaotic local multiplayer game that will surprise you every time with its wealth of content. (And how hard rolling from left to right can be. Especially if your friends are blocking your path with their own badly timed jumps.)

Buy the game (or try the free demo) at: https://pandaqi.itch.io/rolling-in-the-sheepe
Visit my game studio website: https://pandaqi.com
